spells.name: Summon the Loyal Beast
spells.description: Creates a wolf or similar predator that serves the caster loyally for the duration. The animal has normal statistics and intelligence but obeys simple commands.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (create animal), +2 Voice, +2 Sun
spells.searchText: summon the loyal beast creates a wolf or similar predator that serves the caster loyally for the duration. the animal has normal statistics and intelligence but obeys simple commands. base 5 (create animal), +2 voice, +2 sun

spells.name: Heal the Ferocious Bear
spells.description: Heals all wounds on an animal, from light scratches to near-fatal injuries. The animal is restored to perfect health instantly.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (heal all wounds), +1 Touch
spells.searchText: heal the ferocious bear heals all wounds on an animal, from light scratches to near-fatal injuries. the animal is restored to perfect health instantly. base 15 (heal all wounds), +1 touch

spells.name: Blessing of the Abundant Herd
spells.description: Ensures that a herd of animals (cattle, sheep, etc.) remains healthy and reproduces successfully. Animals are protected from disease and predators.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (enhance animals), +1 Touch, +3 Moon, +2 Group
spells.searchText: blessing of the abundant herd ensures that a herd of animals (cattle, sheep, etc.) remains healthy and reproduces successfully. animals are protected from disease and predators. base 10 (enhance animals), +1 touch, +3 moon, +2 group

spells.name: Create the Perfect Steed
spells.description: Creates an exceptional horse with superior strength, speed, and endurance. The steed is perfectly trained and loyal to its rider.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create superior animal), +1 Touch, +3 Moon, +1 for exceptional qualities
spells.searchText: create the perfect steed creates an exceptional horse with superior strength, speed, and endurance. the steed is perfectly trained and loyal to its rider. base 15 (create superior animal), +1 touch, +3 moon, +1 for exceptional qualities

spells.name: Swarm of Protective Bees
spells.description: Creates a swarm of bees that attack the caster's enemies while leaving allies unharmed. The bees cause distraction and minor damage.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (create animals), +2 Voice, +1 Diameter, +2 Group
spells.searchText: swarm of protective bees creates a swarm of bees that attack the caster's enemies while leaving allies unharmed. the bees cause distraction and minor damage. base 5 (create animals), +2 voice, +1 diameter, +2 group

spells.name: Mend the Broken Wing
spells.description: Heals a single light or medium wound on an animal, mending broken bones and closing cuts. Cannot heal disease or deprivation damage.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (heal light wound), +1 Touch
spells.searchText: mend the broken wing heals a single light or medium wound on an animal, mending broken bones and closing cuts. cannot heal disease or deprivation damage. base 5 (heal light wound), +1 touch

spells.name: Guardian of the Sacred Grove
spells.description: Creates a powerful animal guardian (bear, wolf, or great cat) that protects a specific location. The creature is intelligent and can distinguish friends from foes.
spells.guidelines: Base 20 (create intelligent animal), +1 Touch, +4 Year, +1 Herbam requisite
spells.searchText: guardian of the sacred grove creates a powerful animal guardian (bear, wolf, or great cat) that protects a specific location. the creature is intelligent and can distinguish friends from foes. base 20 (create intelligent animal), +1 touch, +4 year, +1 herbam requisite

spells.name: Blessing of Abundant Wool
spells.description: Causes a sheep or similar animal to grow exceptionally fine, abundant wool. The animal produces three times the normal amount of high-quality fiber.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (enhance animal product), +1 Touch, +3 Moon
spells.searchText: blessing of abundant wool causes a sheep or similar animal to grow exceptionally fine, abundant wool. the animal produces three times the normal amount of high-quality fiber. base 5 (enhance animal product), +1 touch, +3 moon

spells.name: Purify the Diseased Flesh
spells.description: Removes all disease from an animal, restoring it to perfect health. Also neutralizes poisons and toxins affecting the creature.
spells.guidelines: Base 20 (cure disease), +1 Touch
spells.searchText: purify the diseased flesh removes all disease from an animal, restoring it to perfect health. also neutralizes poisons and toxins affecting the creature. base 20 (cure disease), +1 touch

spells.name: Create the Messenger Bird
spells.description: Creates an intelligent bird that can carry messages over long distances and return to the caster. The bird understands simple instructions.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (create intelligent animal), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 Mentem requisite
spells.searchText: create the messenger bird creates an intelligent bird that can carry messages over long distances and return to the caster. the bird understands simple instructions. base 10 (create intelligent animal), +1 touch, +2 sun, +1 mentem requisite

spells.name: Strengthen the Working Beast
spells.description: Doubles an animal's natural strength and endurance for heavy labor. The animal can work twice as long without fatigue and carry heavier loads.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (enhance physical abilities), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 for significant enhancement
spells.searchText: strengthen the working beast doubles an animal's natural strength and endurance for heavy labor. the animal can work twice as long without fatigue and carry heavier loads. base 5 (enhance physical abilities), +1 touch, +2 sun, +1 for significant enhancement

spells.name: Birth the Perfect Offspring
spells.description: Ensures that a pregnant animal gives birth to healthy, superior offspring with enhanced traits. The young are born stronger, faster, and more intelligent than normal.
spells.guidelines: Base 25 (create superior offspring), +1 Touch
spells.searchText: birth the perfect offspring ensures that a pregnant animal gives birth to healthy, superior offspring with enhanced traits. the young are born stronger, faster, and more intelligent than normal. base 25 (create superior offspring), +1 touch

spells.name: Speak with Animals
spells.description: Allows the caster to understand and communicate with any natural animal. The animals respond according to their intelligence and nature.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (communicate with animals), +0 Personal, +2 Sun, +3 Hearing, +1 Mentem requisite
spells.searchText: speak with animals allows the caster to understand and communicate with any natural animal. the animals respond according to their intelligence and nature. base 15 (communicate with animals), +0 personal, +2 sun, +3 hearing, +1 mentem requisite

spells.searchText: sense the nature of the beast reveals the basic nature of an animal - its species, health, temperament, and any unusual characteristics or magical influences. base 4 (sense animal nature), +1 eye

spells.searchText: track the wild beast grants supernatural tracking ability, allowing the caster to follow an animal's trail even over difficult terrain or after considerable time. base 5 (enhance senses), +0 personal, +2 sun, +3 smell

spells.searchText: call of the wild hunt allows the caster to hear and understand the calls, howls, and sounds made by wild animals across great distances. base 10 (distant hearing), +0 personal, +2 sun, +3 hearing

spells.name: Nose of the Hound
spells.description: Grants an exceptionally keen sense of smell, allowing the caster to track by scent, identify individuals, and detect hidden things.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (enhance smell), +0 Personal, +2 Sun, +3 Smell
spells.searchText: nose of the hound grants an exceptionally keen sense of smell, allowing the caster to track by scent, identify individuals, and detect hidden things. base 5 (enhance smell), +0 personal, +2 sun, +3 smell

spells.description: Allows communication with magical animals and beasts of legend. The caster can speak with dragons, unicorns, and other intelligent magical creatures.
spells.guidelines: Base 20 (communicate with magical animals), +0 Personal, +2 Sun, +3 Hearing, +1 Mentem requisite

spells.name: Eyes of the Eagle

spells.guidelines: Base 5 (enhance vision), +0 Personal, +2 Sun, +3 Vision
spells.searchText: eyes of the eagle grants incredibly sharp eyesight, allowing the caster to see fine details at great distances and spot movement from far away. base 5 (enhance vision), +0 personal, +2 sun, +3 vision

spells.description: Allows the caster to access the memories and knowledge of an old animal, learning about events the creature has witnessed over its lifetime.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (read memories), +1 Touch, +1 Mentem requisite
spells.searchText: wisdom of the ancient beast allows the caster to access the memories and knowledge of an old animal, learning about events the creature has witnessed over its lifetime. base 15 (read memories), +1 touch, +1 mentem requisite

spells.name: Beast of Outlandish Size
spells.description: Increases an animal's size by 50%, making it larger, stronger, and more intimidating. The animal gains +3 to Strength and +2 to damage.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (change animal size), +2 Voice, +2 Sun, +1 for significant change

spells.name: Steed of Vengeance
spells.description: Transforms a horse into a fierce warhorse with enhanced speed, endurance, and aggression. The horse becomes fearless in battle and strikes with iron-hard hooves.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (major animal transformation), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 for combat enhancement
spells.searchText: steed of vengeance transforms a horse into a fierce warhorse with enhanced speed, endurance, and aggression. the horse becomes fearless in battle and strikes with iron-hard hooves. base 10 (major animal transformation), +1 touch, +2 sun, +1 for combat enhancement

spells.guidelines: Base 10 (enhance animals), +2 Voice, +2 Sun, +2 Group
spells.searchText: blessing of the pack leader enhances a group of animals with pack coordination, increased intelligence, and unified purpose. they work together with supernatural efficiency. base 10 (enhance animals), +2 voice, +2 sun, +2 group

spells.name: Hunter's Keen Edge
spells.description: Sharpens an animal's natural weapons and enhances its hunting instincts. Claws and teeth become razor-sharp, and the animal gains +6 to hunting and tracking.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (enhance natural weapons), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 for instinct enhancement

spells.name: Form of the Fearsome Beast
spells.description: Transforms the caster into a powerful predator like a bear, lion, or dire wolf. Gains enhanced physical abilities, natural weapons, and intimidating presence.
spells.guidelines: Base 20 (major human transformation), +0 Personal, +2 Sun, +1 Corpus requisite, +2 for powerful form

spells.name: Curse of the Unruly Tongue
spells.description: This spell prevents a single animal from making any vocalizations. The creature cannot bark, roar, chirp, or make any sound through its mouth or throat. This is particularly useful for silencing guard dogs or preventing animals from warning others.
spells.guidelines: Base 2 (destroy an animal product), +2 Voice, +1 Diameter

spells.name: Blunt the Viper's Fang
spells.description: This spell destroys the venom glands or poison delivery system of a single venomous creature. The animal loses its ability to inject poison through bites, stings, or other natural attacks permanently. The creature suffers no other harm.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (destroy part of an animal), +2 Voice
spells.searchText: blunt the viper's fang this spell destroys the venom glands or poison delivery system of a single venomous creature. the animal loses its ability to inject poison through bites, stings, or other natural attacks permanently. the creature suffers no other harm. base 4 (destroy part of an animal), +2 voice

spells.name: Weakness of the Pampered Beast
spells.description: This spell weakens an animal, reducing all its physical capabilities. The target suffers -3 to Strength, Stamina, and Dexterity for the duration. Large predators become manageable, and work animals become nearly useless.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (weaken an animal), +2 Voice, +2 Sun

spells.name: Destroy the Fur and Hide
spells.description: This spell completely destroys an animal's fur, hide, or natural covering, leaving the skin bare and vulnerable. The creature loses any natural protection from its coat and becomes extremely sensitive to temperature changes.
spells.guidelines: Base 2 (destroy an animal product), +1 Touch

spells.name: Cripple the Howling Wolf
spells.description: This spell permanently destroys one of an animal's limbs, causing it to wither and become useless. The limb does not fall off but becomes completely non-functional. This inflicts a Medium Wound on the creature.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (destroy a major part of an animal), +2 Voice

spells.name: Rotting Wound of the Beast
spells.description: This devastating spell creates a severe festering wound on an animal that resists natural healing. The spell inflicts a Heavy Wound that cannot heal naturally and requires magical intervention to close properly. The wound continues to weaken the animal over time.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create a serious lasting injury), +2 Voice
spells.searchText: rotting wound of the beast this devastating spell creates a severe festering wound on an animal that resists natural healing. the spell inflicts a heavy wound that cannot heal naturally and requires magical intervention to close properly. the wound continues to weaken the animal over time. base 15 (create a serious lasting injury), +2 voice

spells.name: Sever the Silk Thread
spells.description: This spell destroys silk threads, spider webs, or similar animal-produced materials within the target area. All such materials instantly disintegrate, freeing anyone caught in webs or destroying silk garments and ropes.
spells.guidelines: Base 1 (destroy simple animal products), +2 Voice, +1 for fine targeting

spells.name: Blind the Keen-Eyed Hawk
spells.description: This cruel spell permanently destroys an animal's sight by damaging its eyes beyond repair. The creature becomes completely blind and suffers all the penalties associated with blindness. The spell causes a Light Wound from the trauma.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (permanently destroy a major sense), +2 Voice

spells.name: Wasting Disease of Livestock
spells.description: This spell causes an animal to waste away over time, losing weight and strength. Each week, the animal loses one point from each physical characteristic (Strength, Stamina, Dexterity) until it dies or the spell ends.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (weaken an animal), +2 Voice, +3 Moon

spells.name: Dissolve the Leather Armor
spells.description: This spell completely destroys any leather armor or clothing worn by the target. The treated animal hide disintegrates instantly, leaving the wearer unprotected. Other materials are unaffected.
spells.guidelines: Base 3 (destroy processed animal products), +2 Voice

spells.name: Death of the Noble Beast
spells.description: This lethal spell outright kills a single animal by destroying its life force. Creatures with Might scores may resist with Magic Resistance, but mundane animals have no defense. The creature simply collapses and dies instantly with no visible wounds.
spells.guidelines: Base 20 (kill an animal outright), +2 Voice
spells.searchText: death of the noble beast this lethal spell outright kills a single animal by destroying its life force. creatures with might scores may resist with magic resistance, but mundane animals have no defense. the creature simply collapses and dies instantly with no visible wounds. base 20 (kill an animal outright), +2 voice

spells.searchText: speak with animals allows the caster to communicate with animals within hearing range. animals respond according to their intelligence and nature. base 5 (communicate with animals), +0 personal, +1 concentration, +3 hearing

spells.searchText: command the loyal beast forces an animal to obey a complex command or series of commands. the animal acts with intelligence and purpose to fulfill the caster's wishes. base 15 (control animal actions), +2 voice, +1 concentration

spells.name: Panic of the Trembling Heart
